name: Marshallow: Pilferage in YolkTown
description:
Marshallow: Pilferage in YolkTown is a 3D single player game set in a town during a festival. Among all the villagers in this town there is a thief, your duty as a marshal is to find and arrest him. To do this you must talk to the villagers who have been victims or witnesses of a robbery, they will give you details about the appearance of the thief. But beware, you should take a good look at the villagers, because they share accessories and characteristics with the thief and some will give you dubious clues.

Controls:

  • PC: Mouse.
  • Mobile: Tap.

Marshallow: Pilferage in YolkTown (2021) by Lightning Opal:

  • Mario Belén.
  • Sergio Cruz.
  • Mireya Funke.
  • Samuel Ríos.
  • Enrique Sánchez.

Website: https://lightningopal.github.io/
